amendment.description: To amend title 44 of the United States Code, to provide for the suspension of fines under certain circumstances for first-time paperwork violations by small business concerns.

action.text: Proposed amendment SA 110 withdrawn in Senate.

Amendment SA 110 proposed by Senator Vitter to Amendment SA 100. (consideration: CR S1027-1029; text: CR S1027-1028) To amend title 44 of the United States Code, to provide for the suspension of fines under certain circumstances for first-time paperwork violations by small business concerns.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 110 proposed by Senator Vitter to Amendment SA 100.
